Section.Catchline: Travel to or conducting business with a country in the Western Hemisphere lacking diplomatic relations with the United States.

Subsection.Text: An officer, employee, agent, or representative of:

Paragraph.Text: A political subdivision of the state; or
A corporation, partnership, association, or other entity that does business or contracts with a state agency, receives state funds, or claims a credit against any tax imposed by the state

Subsection.Text: may not travel to or do business with any country located in the Western Hemisphere which lacks diplomatic relations with the United States.
A political subdivision that violates this section is ineligible to receive state funds.
A corporation, partnership, association, or other entity that violates this section is ineligible to:

Paragraph.Text: Engage in business or contract with a state agency;
Claim a credit against any tax imposed by the state.
